content: Jeyachandran. Welcome to the technical round of the interview. I'm glad you could make it. Before we begin, I'd like to take a look at your resume. It looks like you have a background in AI, ML, and web development. Can you tell me a bit more about your experience with building an AI chatbot with real-time database integration as mentioned in your resume?

Jeyachandran. As I was saying, I'd like to know more about your experience with building an AI chatbot with real-time database integration. How did you approach this project, and what kind of features did you implement in the chatbot?
